snippet: Jon Drummond, a coach and a former sprinting star, received an eight-year doping ban after arbitrators found he had possessed, trafficked and administered banned substances and had assisted in their use and cover-up.
abstract: Track coach and former sprinting star Jon Drummond receives eight-year doping ban for possessing, trafficking and administering prohibited substances.
lead_paragraph: Jon Drummond, a coach and a former sprinting star, received an eight-year doping ban after arbitrators found he had possessed, trafficked and administered banned substances and had assisted in their use and cover-up.

headline.main: Track Coach Jon Drummond Receives Eight-Year Ban
headline.print_headline: Coach Suspended for 8 Years Over Banned Substances
